name: St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - St Joseph's Health Centre - Overnight Stay Respite Program
comment:
Short-term caregiver relief program to support older adults who live in their own home but require temporary accommodation due to frailty, depression, social isolation and / or dementia. Services include:
  • 24-hour supervision and monitoring (RPN staff available)
  • assessment and individual program planning
  • supervised therapeutic social and recreational activities
  • care coordination
  • education and counselling
  • community liaison and advocacy
  • adult day program
  • supper club

St Joseph's Health Centre Guelph - St Joseph's Health Centre - Overnight Stay Respite Program

Short-term caregiver relief program to support older adults who live in their own home but require temporary accommodation due to frailty, depression, social isolation and / or dementia. Services include:<br><ul><li>24-hour supervision and monitoring (RPN staff available)</li><li>assessment and individual program planning</li><li>supervised therapeutic social and recreational activities</li><li>care coordination</li><li>education and counselling</li><li>community liaison and advocacy</li><li>adult day program</li><li>supper club</li></ul>

Location/f4df25d8-1755-4aab-95f9-abdc80495f52

Location

$42.28 per night

Eligibility criteria determined by Ontario Health atHome Waterloo-Wellington<br>Eligibility includes: * medically stable * able to tolerate 14 days of isolation * willingness to consent and complete COVID 19 surveillance, testing upon admission to the program and as required/ directed by the Wellington Dufferin Guelph Public Health * must be smoke-free and substance-free * up to 1 person may provide physical assistance for activities of daily living
